general: Today, the Moon in harmony with Saturn gives you a dose of determination. You feel more in tune with your goals and are eager to move forward with rigor. Take advantage of this energy to structure your projects.
love: Express your feelings with sincerity, it will strengthen your bond.
work: Focus on collaboration with your colleagues, new ideas will emerge.
health: Take the time to relax, even a short break can recharge your batteries.
advice: Patience is the key to your success today.
teaser: A day conducive to determination and love.
